name: The Bet
description:
Note: This game may be removed after a couple of weeks because it will be added to a "Main Game."

This game is simply a guessing game. You have 20 $ to bet to a random guy and your objective is not to lose your 20 $ and win the game by getting the 20 $ of the guy. The game also provides a dialogue to make it a bit less boring. The music is proudly made by me (the music sucks). I hope you enjoy this game prototype.
